Package io.jans.context

Class J2EContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jans.context.J2EContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebContext
    public class J2EContext
extends Object
implements WebContext
    This is wrapper and utility for J2E request and response
    Author:
    Yuriy Movchan 11/14/2014
